definition[0]: to cook something using dry heat, in an oven
definition[1]: to make something become hard by heating it
example[3]: The bricks were baked in the sun.
explanation[0]: Bake belongs to a group of verbs where the same noun can be the subject of the verb or its object
explanation[1]: In this sentence, ‘the cake’ is the object of bake
explanation[2]: In this sentence, ‘the cake’ is the subject of bake
example[5]: The cake should bake for 40 minutes
